description: The 'vcpus_used' value returned by the driver when reporting available resources is always 0. The VC driver doesn't track number of vcpus instead it trackers MHz shares.
title: VMware VC driver reports incorrect value for vcpus_used

comments.content: The 'vcpus_used' value returned by the driver when reporting available resources is always 0. The VC driver doesn't track number of vcpus instead it trackers MHz shares.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~maithem

comments.content: Could you explain how you got the vcpus_used = 0?  I used "nova hypervisor-stats" and "nova hypervisor-show <id>" and they both returned the correct vcpus_used.  Although https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/virt/vmwareapi/driver.py#L425 sets vcpus_used = 0.  I assume the resource tracker is using the existing instances vcpu count to arrive at the number I see.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~thang-pham
